short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a list of favorite jobs along the right side of the screen!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a super simple way to truly have favorite jobs along the right side in quick books.

You must be clocked in to the job you want to add as a favorite, then click the button "Add current job to favorites" to add as a favorite.

Clicking a favorite will navigate & clock you in to the job.


It's not meant to be pretty; it's meant to work.

NEW FEATURES:

--Drag to re-order favorite jobs.

--Set the color of a job by clicking the edit icon (pencil) next to the job you wish to edit, then select the color using the color picker provided, then click "Save"

--To delete a favorite, now click the edit icon (pencil) next to the favorite job you want to remove. Then click the button "DELETE Fav"

--favorite button will now open Timesheet if window isn't open.
